TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ContractAdapter extends System.Object
public ref class ContractAdapter abstract sealed

summary.span: Proporciona los métodos para compartir y adaptar de nuevo los complementos.

span.span: Provides methods for sharing and readapting add-ins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Puede usar esta clase para compartir un complemento con otro host que no tiene la misma canalización a ese complemento (especialmente, otro host que no tiene la misma vista de host que el complemento).You can use this class to share an add-in with another host that does not have the same pipeline to that add-in (particularly, another host that does not have the same host view of the add-in). Si necesita adaptar un activado complemento desde su vista de host del contrato, utilice el método.If you need to adapt an activated add-in from its host view to the contract, use the method. Si tiene una instancia del contrato y debe convertirlo a la vista de host, use el método.If you have an instance of the contract and need to convert it to the host view, use the method.

summary.span: Obtiene una vista de host de un complemento si se encuentra un adaptador host apropiado en la ubicación especificada.

span.span: Obtains a host view of an add-in if a suitable host-side adapter is found at a specified location.

MemberSignature.Value: public static TView ContractToViewAdapter<TView> (System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractHandle contract, System.AddIn.Hosting.PipelineStoreLocation location);
.method public static hidebysig !!TView ContractToViewAdapter<TView>(class System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractHandle contract, valuetype System.AddIn.Hosting.PipelineStoreLocation location) cil managed
Public Shared Function ContractToViewAdapter(Of TView) (contract As ContractHandle, location As PipelineStoreLocation) As TView

typeparam.name: TView
typeparam.span: Tipo que define la vista de host del complemento.

span.span: The type that defines the host view of the add-in.

param.name: contract
param.span: Identificador del contrato utilizado por el complemento que se va a compartir.

span.span: A handle to the contract used by the add-in to be shared.

param.name: location
param.span: Base de la aplicación del host.

summary.span: Obtiene una vista de host de un complemento si se encuentra un adaptador host apropiado en la ubicación especificada por un valor de la enumeración .

span.span: Obtains a host view of an add-in if a suitable host-side adapter is found at a location specified by a value from the enumeration.

returns.span: Vista de host del complemento que se va a compartir.

span.span: The host view of the add-in that is shared.

remarks.format: ## Remarks En este escenario, una entidad tiene una instancia de un contrato y desea adaptarla a una vista determinada.In this scenario, an entity has an instance of a contract and wants to adapt it to a particular view. Utilice este método para consultar el sistema para buscar y crear instancias de un adaptador para convertir en esa vista.Use this method to query the system to find and instantiate an adapter to convert into that view.

MemberSignature.Value: public static TView ContractToViewAdapter<TView> (System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractHandle contract, string pipelineRoot);

Public Shared Function ContractToViewAdapter(Of TView) (contract As ContractHandle, pipelineRoot As String) As TView

span.span: The type that defines the host view of the add-in.

param.span: Identificador del contrato utilizado por el complemento que se va a compartir.

span.span: A handle to the contract used by the add-in to be shared.

param.name: pipelineRoot
param.span: Ruta de acceso al almacén de complementos.

span.span: A path to the add-in store.

summary.span: Obtiene una vista de host de un complemento si se encuentra un adaptador host apropiado en la ubicación especificada por una ruta de acceso.

span.span: Obtains a host view of an add-in if a suitable host-side adapter is found at a location specified by a path.

returns.span: Vista de host del complemento que se va a compartir.

span.span: The host view of the add-in that is shared.

remarks.format: ## Remarks En este escenario, una entidad tiene una instancia de un contrato y desea adaptarla a una vista determinada.In this scenario, an entity has an instance of a contract and wants to adapt it to a particular view. Utilice este método para consultar el sistema para buscar y crear instancias de un adaptador para convertir en esa vista.Use this method to query the system to find and instantiate an adapter to convert into that view.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractHandle ViewToContractAdapter(object view) cil managed
Public Shared Function ViewToContractAdapter (view As Object) As ContractHandle

param.name: view
param.span: Vista de host de un complemento activado por el sistema del dominio de aplicación actual.

span.span: The host view of an add-in activated by the system from the current application domain.

summary.span: Obtiene el identificador del contrato para una vista de host o un complemento proporcionado.

span.span: Gets the handle to the contract for a provided host view of an add-in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks En este escenario, la entidad de origen (un host) tiene un complemento que desea ser compartido por una entidad de destino (otro host).In this scenario, the source entity (a host) has an add-in that wants to be shared by a destination entity (another host). Utilice este método para obtener el identificador del contrato que se crean instancias para la entidad de origen por el sistema del complemento.Use this method to obtain the handle to the contract that was instantiated for the source entity by the add-in system.
